ygData.subject: RE: [EQ_Tinkering] Floating Coffin
ygData.msgSnippet: /rofl This one left me rolling!  Love to see a gnomish translator implemented in EQ.  Right click on any text and it turns into gnomish! Leagnomo ... From:
ygData.messageBody:
/rofl
This one left me rolling! Love to see a gnomish translator implemented in
EQ. Right click on any text and it turns into gnomish!

Leagnomo

-----Original Message-----

Sorry, but the Community Recopies page is a list of recopies that people
have submitted that people would like to see implemented. They don't
actually exist in game.

Tinik Gutenungrie
